Skill.label: ----Wither totem setup 4L (not sure you need this)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
This is an updated POB...
I messed around with some ideas in this POB. Wither totem is probbaly not needed. Vortex hextouch dispare is not needed since i have it on ring now. This gives us 2x4L that are free for quality of life stuff. These are my new ideas:
Casting totems in bossfights takes time and is probably just a total dps decrease since we play with witherprescence ascendency. Thats why i think a arcanist brand setup for bosses and a CWDT setup with som quality of life stuff would be better.
Since we use sigil of power for damage reduction to enemies but we also get lightning damage i removed void mannipulation and added increased critical damage instead. I think the lightning damage might let us shock for 10% extra dmg sometimes? maybee? i dont know, im gonna try it =).
I have added withering stacks to the DPS calc, more accurate. You can probably unclick dying sun if you want to check a more consitent dmg.
